title: T-Play Indoor Playground at HomeTeamNS Yishun & Bukit
blurb: Indoor playground with multiple locations and time slots.
description: T-Play is an indoor playground designed and conceptualized in Sweden. It is a playground that allows children to develop holistically. Encouraging children to learn through play, it provides a safe environment for children to explore and challenge themselves physically and mentally. Suitable for children of all ages, it features various play areas and activities to keep them entertained. Parents can relax while their children have fun in a safe and stimulating environment. The playground offers different time slots throughout the week, including peak and non-peak hours.

title: T-Play Yishun
blurb: Indoor playground at HomeTeamNS Yishun for kids.
description: T-Play is an indoor playground designed and conceptualized by The Polliwogs, incorporating Scandinavian themes. It is suitable for children between the ages of 6 months to 12 years old. The playground is located at HomeTeamNS Yishun. It features various play areas and obstacles to keep children entertained and active. T-Play aims to provide a safe and engaging environment for children to develop their physical and social skills through play. Parents can relax while their children explore the playground.
full_address: Level 1, 2 Yishun Walk, Singapore 767944 2 Bukit Batok, West Ave 7, Singapore 659003

title: T-Play Bukit Batok: HomeTeamNS Indoor Playground
blurb: Indoor playground at HomeTeamNS Bukit Batok Clubhouse.
description: T-Play Bukit Batok is an indoor playground designed and conceptualized in Sweden, that adopts a Scandinavian theme. It is a playground crafted with intricate details to engage children in purposeful play. The playground is designed to allow children to develop in areas such as cognitive, emotional, social and physical through play. It includes various play areas and obstacles to provide a fun and engaging experience for children of different age groups. T-Play is suitable for children between the ages of 1 to 12 years old. It is a great place for families to spend quality time together and create lasting memories. The playground is safe and clean, and the staff are friendly and helpful. It is a perfect place for children to learn and grow through play.

title: T-Play Khatib: Peranakan-Themed Adventureland
blurb: Interactive trampoline, climbing slide tower, sport pitch.
description: T-Play at Khatib has an interactive trampoline, climbing slide tower, sport pitch, foam ball shooting arena, ninja course for toddlers and many more exciting features. T-Play indoor playgrounds are designed to engage the child’s brain development, motion coordination and sense of direction. We are really BIG on parent-child bonding too! T-Play partners The Intan, Singapore’s award winning home Museum to transform T Play Khatib into a Peranakan adventureland where fun, play & learning come together in a truly Singaporean spirit. Celebrate your birthday with us!

title: T-Play Khatib - HomeTeamNS
blurb: Designed in Sweden, T-Play is an indoor playground.
description: Designed in Sweden and assembled in Singapore, T-Play is an indoor playground that adopts a universally inclusive play concept. The playground is designed to allow both parent and child to play together in a safe and conducive environment. T-Play caters to children between the ages of 12 months to 12 years old. It is located at HomeTeamNS Khatib.
datetime_display: Please check the website for operating hours.

title: T-Play Indoor Playground at HomeTeamNS Clubhouses
blurb: Indoor playground at HomeTeamNS Clubhouses for kids.
description: T-Play is an indoor playground concept designed by The Polliwogs and HomeTeamNS. It is an initiative to provide HomeTeamNS members and the public with a safe, creative, and fun environment for children to play and learn. The playground incorporates Scandinavian themes to encourage children to learn through play. It features various play areas designed to stimulate children’s imagination and motor skills. T-Play caters to children of different age groups, with dedicated zones for toddlers and older kids. It is a great place for families to spend quality time together, fostering bonding and creating lasting memories in a secure and engaging setting. The playground is suitable for families with young children looking for a fun and active indoor experience.

title: Action Motion Adventure Centre at HomeTeamNS
blurb: Exciting adventures await at Action Motion!
description: Action Motion offers a variety of thrilling activities suitable for families and adventure seekers. Experience high-energy fun with climbing walls, obstacle courses, and interactive games designed to challenge and entertain. Perfect for kids and adults looking for an adrenaline-pumping experience. Enjoy a day filled with laughter, excitement, and unforgettable memories as you explore the different zones within Action Motion. Our facilities are designed to ensure safety and provide a stimulating environment for all participants. Get ready to unleash your inner adventurer and create lasting memories with your loved ones at Action Motion.
